sentences.sContent: ...a country where half the workforce is unemployed.
sentences.sCn: …一个半数劳动力无业的国家。

synos.tran: 劳动力；工人总数，职工总数

remMethod.val: work(工作) + force(队伍) → 劳动人口

trans.tranCn: 受雇的或现有的工作人员总数； 劳动人口
trans.tranOther: The workforce is the total number of people in a country or region who are physically able to do a job and are available for work
